posts.post_content: This card showed its face back in the days with Spellweaver Helix. By removing cheap sorcery with this card, you can put three wurms into play repeatedly without even playing it from your hand.
posts.html:

Posted By: Cyberium (6/20/2010 12:00:08 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Freaking LOVE this card. Especially in EDH. Have [Hell's Caretaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hell's Caretaker) + [Eternal Witness](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eternal Witness) + whatever sac outlet you want. Cast this, next upkeep, return the Witness to play and bring this back. Cast it again, and repeat. Works well with [Altar of Dementia](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Altar of Dementia), or [Coat of Arms](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Coat of Arms). [Primal Rage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primal Rage), [Roughshod Mentor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Roughshod Mentor), and [Brawn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brawn) are easy, permanent ways to give them trample; things like [Stampede](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stampede), [Overrun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overrun), and [Overwhelming Stampede](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overwhelming Stampede) work wonders as well.
posts.html:
Freaking LOVE this card. Especially in EDH. Have Hell's Caretaker + Eternal Witness + whatever sac outlet you want. Cast this, next upkeep, return the Witness to play and bring this back. Cast it again, and repeat. Works well with Altar of Dementia, or Coat of Arms. Primal Rage, Roughshod Mentor, and Brawn are easy, permanent ways to give them trample; things like Stampede, Overrun, and Overwhelming Stampede work wonders as well.

posts.post_content:
An amazing card and a fun win condition.  
  
Army of the Damned is about the closest card that comes to mind as being similar, and while it is bit weaker, it is also a bit cheaper to cast and Flashback, so it balances out. Play them for for lots of tokens!
